## 29-06-2025 Java occidental - Bandung, Jawa

```{=html}
<div class="gallery-container" id="photo-gallery"></div>

<script>
fetch('https://mvince11.synology.me/photos/gallery.php')
  .then(res => res.json())
  .then(data => {
    const container = document.getElementById('photo-gallery');
    data.forEach(photo => {
      const a = document.createElement('a');
      a.href = photo.full;
      a.className = 'glightbox';
      a.setAttribute('data-gallery', 'syno');

      const img = document.createElement('img');
      img.src = photo.thumb;
      img.alt = 'Photo';
      img.loading = 'lazy';

      a.appendChild(img);
      container.appendChild(a);
    });

    GLightbox({ selector: '.glightbox' });
  });
</script>

```
